casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Darrin M. SANDERS 265P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Darrin M. Sanders, for Sanders, Darrin M. Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
